sidebar.claimSubtitle: Choose a unique username for your new page.
sidebar.selectOrCreate: Select or create a page to access the menu.
sidebar.createError: Failed to create page. Username might be taken.

overview.title: Dashboard
overview.subtitle: Welcome back! Here's what's happening with your profile.
overview.connectStripeHint: Connect Stripe to see your sales analytics
overview.noActivityBody: Share your page to start tracking views and clicks from your audience.
overview.upgradeBody: Get detailed analytics, custom domains, and remove Portyo branding from your page.

steps.welcome: Welcome to the Overview! Here’s a quick summary of your performance.
steps.stats: These cards show views, clicks, and average CTR.
steps.sales: Track sales, revenue, and daily trends in this panel.
steps.activity: Recent activity and quick filters to analyze events.
steps.sidebar: This is your main dashboard menu for navigation.
steps.navEditor: Open the editor to customize your page.
steps.navForms: Create forms and capture leads here.
steps.navProducts: Manage products and sales in this section.
steps.navIntegrations: Connect integrations like Stripe and other apps.
steps.navSettings: Access your account settings and preferences.

steps.intro: This is your editor. Control the entire page structure here.
steps.palette: Drag a block from the list to build your page (drag & drop).
steps.canvas: Drop blocks here and reorder them by dragging the handle.
steps.block: Click a card to edit content and adjust styles like color and font.
steps.settingsTab: Open Settings to adjust global styles (fonts, background, cards).
steps.typography: Change the site font or upload a custom font.
steps.cardStyle: Set card color, opacity, and effects to match your brand.
steps.preview: Live preview of the final result. Your edits appear here.
steps.mobilePreview: Use mobile preview to see how it looks on phones.

steps.header: Manage your leads and quick actions here.
steps.toggle: Enable or pause lead capture with this toggle.
steps.export: Export all leads to CSV with one click.
steps.stats: Quick metrics: total, new today, and conversion rate.
steps.search: Search by email and filter results.
steps.table: Full leads list with actions to email or remove.
steps.bulk: Select multiple leads to send, export, or delete in bulk.

steps.header: Manage your products and catalog status here.
steps.add: Click here to add a new product.
steps.fee: This banner shows your store fee and an upgrade shortcut.
steps.search: Search products and filter by status.
steps.card: This is a product card. Edit or remove from the actions.
steps.addPlaceholder: Use this shortcut to create another product quickly.

steps.header: Manage your portfolio and showcase projects here.
steps.add: Add a new project to your portfolio.
steps.grid: Your portfolio projects are listed here.
steps.card: This is a project card. Edit or delete using the actions.
steps.addPlaceholder: Use this shortcut to create another project quickly.

steps.newPost: Create a new post with this button.
steps.toolbar: Search and filter your posts here.
steps.table: Your posts list is displayed here.
steps.row: This is a post row. Use actions to edit or delete.

steps.header: Manage and share your QR codes here.
steps.create: Create a new QR code by adding a destination URL.
steps.list: Your saved QR codes appear here. Select one to preview.
steps.preview: Preview the selected QR code and copy its link.
steps.appearance: Customize colors and appearance of the QR code.
steps.download: Download the QR code as PNG.

steps.header: This is your automation builder. Name your workflow and manage its status here.
steps.canvas: Build your flow on this canvas. Connect steps to define the journey.
steps.palette: Drag a trigger or action from this toolbar into the canvas.
steps.node: Click a node to configure its details and behavior.
steps.actions: Save drafts or activate your automation when you're ready.

steps.header: Manage marketing slots and proposals here.
steps.create: Create a new advertising slot for your page.
steps.stripe: Connect Stripe to receive payouts from advertisers.
steps.grid: Your marketing slots are listed here.
steps.card: This is a slot card with status and pricing.
steps.proposals: View proposals and manage applications here.

steps.status: Pause or resume bookings from this control.
steps.tabs: Switch between Today, Bookings, and Availability.
steps.filters: Filter bookings by status or date.
steps.blocked: Block specific dates on the calendar.

steps.card: This is a template card. Edit or delete it from here.

steps.header: Connect and manage your integrations here.
steps.card: This is an integration card with status and description.
steps.action: Use this button to connect or manage the integration.

steps.usage: Track your email usage for automations.
steps.card: This is an automation card with status and metrics.
steps.actions: Use these buttons to activate, edit, or delete.

steps.create: Create a new form to collect data.
steps.card: This is a form card with basic details.
steps.answers: View submitted answers for this form.

steps.basic: Edit page title, description, keywords, and favicon.
steps.social: Customize social sharing title, description, and image.

steps.overview: View Google Analytics summary data here.
steps.codes: Add tracking IDs like Google Analytics and Facebook Pixel.
steps.indexing: Control search engine indexing for your page.

leads.title: Audience
leads.subtitle: Manage your subscribers and grow your community.
leads.shareBio: Share your bio link to start growing your list
leads.removeSingleDesc: Are you sure you want to remove {{email}} from your list? This subscriber will no longer receive your updates.
leads.removeBulkDesc: Are you sure you want to remove {{count}} subscribers? This action cannot be undone.

qrcode.title: QR Codes
qrcode.subtitle: Manage and track your QR codes.

seo.upgradeSubtitle: SEO settings are available for Standard and Pro plans. Upgrade now to customize your page title, description, and favicon.
seo.title: SEO Settings
seo.subtitle: Customize how your page appears in search results and social media.

search.title: Search Engine Optimization
search.subtitle: Control how your page looks on Google and other search engines.

social.title: Social Media Sharing
social.subtitle: Customize how your link looks when shared on social media.

placeholders.metaDescription: A brief description of your page...

help.favicon: Upload a square image (PNG, JPG) for your browser tab icon. Recommended 512x512px.
help.socialImage: Image that appears when your link is shared on social media. Recommended 1200x630px.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.subtitle: Track performance and add your analytics IDs.

gaPopup.title: Connect Google Analytics
gaPopup.subtitle: Track visitors on your page
gaPopup.body: Add your Google Analytics Measurement ID to start tracking page activity.

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.subtitle: Add tracking IDs and privacy controls.

overview.title: Overview
overview.note: Data updates may take up to 24 hours.

noIndex.title: Hide from search engines
noIndex.subtitle: Prevent this page from being indexed by Google.

products.title: Product Catalog
products.subtitle: Manage your digital products and services.

fee.title: Transaction Fee: {{fee}}%
fee.subtitle: Upgrade to Pro to remove transaction fees.

delete.title: Delete Product?
delete.body: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.

stripe.title: Stripe Not Connected
stripe.subtitle: Connect to sell products
stripe.body: To create and sell products, you need to connect your Stripe account first. Go to Integrations and set up your Stripe connection.

errors.create: Failed to create product. Please try again.

delete.title: Delete Post?
delete.body: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.

scheduler.title: Booking Scheduler
scheduler.subtitle: Configure your weekly availability and manage blocked dates.

empty.todayBody: You have no appointments scheduled for today.
empty.title: No bookings found
empty.body: Try changing the filter or share your booking link.

blockedDates.title: Blocked Dates
blockedDates.subtitle: Select dates to block off from your calendar.

googleCalendar.connected: Your bookings are automatically syncing with your Google Calendar.
googleCalendar.disconnected: Connect your calendar to automatically create events with Google Meet links for every booking.

reschedule.title: Reschedule Booking
reschedule.helper: Select a new date and time. The customer will receive an email to confirm.
reschedule.noSlots: No available slots for this date.

upgrade.title: Upgrade to Standard
upgrade.body: Custom domains are available on Standard and Pro plans. Upgrade now to connect your own domain (e.g., yourname.com) to your page.

domains.title: Custom Domain
domains.subtitle: Connect your own domain name to your Portyo page.

config.title: Domain Configuration
config.subtitle: Enter the domain you want to use for your page.
config.helper: Enter your domain without http:// or https://

dns.title: DNS Configuration Required
dns.body: To make your domain work, you need to add a DNS record to your domain provider (like GoDaddy, Namecheap, or Cloudflare).
dns.note: Note: DNS changes can take up to 48 hours to propagate globally, though it usually happens within a few minutes.

status.title: Domain Linked
status.body: Your bio is configured to use {{domain}}. If you've set up your DNS correctly, your page should be accessible soon.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.subtitle: Connect your favorite tools to supercharge your bio page.

items.stripe: Accept payments and donations directly on your page.
items.instagram: Display your latest posts and stories directly on your bio page.
items.youtube: Embed your latest videos or playlists automatically.
items.tiktok: Showcase your viral TikTok videos to your audience.
items.spotify: Share your favorite tracks, albums, or playlists.
items.twitter: Display your latest tweets and engage with your followers.
items.linkedin: Connect your professional profile and show your latest updates.
items.mailchimp: Collect emails and grow your newsletter audience.
items.googleAnalytics: Track visitors and gain deeper insights into your traffic.

automationList.subtitle: Create workflows that run on autopilot.
